snippet.title: Rainbow Skies Trailer
snippet.description:
http://www.rainbow-skies.com -- From the makers of Rainbow Moon comes a new fantasy role-playing game. Rainbow Skies is currently in development for PlayStation 3 & PlayStation Vita and expected to launch in 2015.

Rainbow Skies tells the story of the three young protagonists Damion, Layne and Ashly, that meet under unforeseen circumstances and who become caught in the deadly crossfire of two rival super powers.

Immerse yourself in a colorful and vibrant world, filled to the brim with friends and foes, murky dungeons, turn-based battles, towns, shops, and everything else your role-playing heart desires.

Tamable monsters, upgradable characters, and a variety of weapons and equipment offer you a wide range of customization and character development possibilities. Tons of optional and endgame content, side and treasure hunt quests, a new main story, and other exciting content will keep you hooked for countless hours.
